sense.def:
Kadar je človek ali predmet
missing
, ni tam, kjer naj bi bil, in ga ne moremo najti.

seg.quote: Some of her jewellery was missing.
I want to report a missing person.

sense.def:
Kadar je del nečesa
missing
, ga je nekdo vzel in ne več vrnil nazaj.

seg.quote: The car was a wreck, with all its wheels missing.
